name: Leaderboard
query: SELECT CAST(r.agent_id AS VARCHAR) AS id, COUNT(*) AS "Tasks", ROUND(AVG(r.scores.detection) * 100, 1) AS "Detection %", ROUND(AVG(r.scores.diagnosis) * 100, 1) AS "Diagnosis %", ROUND(AVG(r.scores.recovery) * 100, 1) AS "Recovery %", ROUND(AVG(r.scores.total), 1) AS "Total Score" FROM results, UNNEST(results.results) AS r WHERE r.scores.total IS NOT NULL GROUP BY r.agent_id ORDER BY "Total Score" DESC

name: Agent vs Error Type
query: SELECT CAST(r.agent_id AS VARCHAR) AS id, r.category AS "Error Type", COUNT(*) AS "Tasks", ROUND(AVG(r.scores.total), 1) AS "Avg Score" FROM results, UNNEST(results.results) AS r WHERE r.scores.total IS NOT NULL GROUP BY r.agent_id, r.category ORDER BY r.agent_id, "Avg Score" DESC

name: All Results
query: SELECT CAST(r.agent_id AS VARCHAR) AS id, r.model_name AS "Model", r.task_id AS "Task", r.category AS "Category", ROUND(r.scores.detection * 100, 0) AS "Det%", ROUND(r.scores.diagnosis * 100, 0) AS "Diag%", ROUND(r.scores.recovery * 100, 0) AS "Rec%", ROUND(r.scores.total, 1) AS "Total" FROM results, UNNEST(results.results) AS r WHERE r.scores.total IS NOT NULL ORDER BY r.scores.total DESC
